Posts.Content: Karentlc wrote: I had mt first mammogram in April, followed by an ultrasound. They recommended a 6 month follow up. I just had another one of each last week and it has changed shape. I have a ultasound guided core biopsy Wednesday. Irregular 8mm by 8mm by 3mm mass at 12:00. I am very scared. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Biopsy before thanksgiving Karentlc Kite

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2011 04:21PM Karentlc wrote: Thank you also much. I just sooo happy I happened upon this community of women who are in the same place with the same fears and concerns. I am drinking a glass of wine an trying not to get too worked up. I will be receiving your thoughts and prayers and sending a whole lot of my own your way too. Thank you all.
